mapper.update: update admin_info set username=#{username}, userpass=#{userpass}, role_id=#{roleId}, nickname=#{nickname}, sex=#{sex}, phone=#{phone}, email=#{email} where id=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from admin_info where id in (${arrStr})
mapper.select:
select count(1) from admin_info a left join role_info r on a.role_id=r.role_id
a.username like concat('%',#{username},'%')
